Headline: #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Wilson/Clarendon
ShortDescription: SB 135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temp rerouted via: Simmons, Marine Dr., Montrose, and Clarendon, due to, street blockage, near  Wilson/Clarendon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Simmons, Marine Drive, Montrose, and Clarendon, due to street blockage, near Wilson/Clarendon.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays at Ashland/63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays at Ashland/63rd. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
